title: Mini-Ep 212: Living In Your Light
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 212: Living In Your Light
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree chat about some new discoveries in the daily planner solutions department. Then, they hear from listeners about the consequences of peeing in the shower, being excluded from a group hang, and living your truth even when your spouse doesn...
description:
Kate and Doree chat about some new discoveries in the daily planner solutions department. Then, they hear from listeners about the consequences of peeing in the shower, being excluded from a group hang, and living your truth even when your spouse doesn’t support you.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter


For info on the Thanks for Waiting Virtual Launch Party, click here!
